00049 class cdaemonlog : public clogger {
00050         protected:
00051                 int cso; 
00052                 char resp; 
00053                 char cmd; 
00054                 struct sockaddr_un cun; 
00055                
00057                 uint8_t read_common( std::vector<entry_type> &, 
00058                         size_type, size_type );
00059 
00061                 uint8_t cnt_common( size_type & );
00062             
00063         public:
00064                 cdaemonlog();
00065                 virtual ~cdaemonlog();
00066                 
00068                 enum cmd {
00069                         cmd_write=0, 
00070                         cmd_dom_log_read_log, 
00071                         cmd_dom_log_cnt_log, 
00072                         cmd_log_read_dom_log, 
00073                         cmd_log_cnt_dom_log 
00074                 };
00075 
00076                 uint8_t write( result , const std::string & );
00077                 uint8_t dom_log_read_log( std::vector<entry_type> &, size_type, size_type );
00078                 uint8_t dom_log_cnt_log( size_type & );
00079                 uint8_t log_read_dom_log( std::vector<entry_type> &, size_type, size_type );
00080                 uint8_t log_cnt_dom_log( size_type & );
00081 };
